name: METEOR DODGER (Philliam)
description:
Meteor Dodger is a simple game where you dodge meteors to stay alive for as long as possible to beat your high score.

Controls:

Use 'A' and 'D' or LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys to move.

Use 'W' and 'S' or UP and DOWN arrow keys to navigate the main menu.

Use 'SPACE' or 'ENTER' to select an option in the main menu.

Use 'ESC' to exit the game.

Use 'F11' to toggle fullscreen.

Development:

Meteor Dodger was made in just a few hours in Java using my own game engine to challenge myself to make a complete game in as little time as possible.
